meanings.definition: A waterproof coat worn to protect against rain.
meanings.sent1: During the storm, everyone wore raincoats.
meanings.sent2: She always carries her raincoat in case of rain.
meanings.sent3: The bright yellow raincoats made the children look like little ducks.
meanings.sent4: The city shimmered under the raincoats of the sky.
meanings.sent5: The sound of rain hitting the raincoat was oddly soothing.

meanings.definition: To cover or protect with a raincoat.
meanings.sent1: He will raincoat himself before going out in the drizzle.
meanings.sent2: Remember to raincoat your bag to keep your books dry.
meanings.sent3: She decided to raincoat her phone with a plastic bag during the downpour.
meanings.sent4: The trees were raincoated with a glistening layer of water after the storm.
meanings.sent5: The gardener carefully raincoated the delicate flowers from the heavy rain.
